name: Space Lawn
description:
Your lawn morfed into a mysitcal galactic entity. You have to stop it!

Use your trusty (and very regular scythe) to cut the cosmic corruption out of your house.

Space Lawn was created in 48 hours as a submission for the Slavic Game Jam 2019.

Creators:

Błażej Kuchta - Programming

Piotr Targosz - Design/VFX/SFX

Krzysztof Nowakowski - Programming

Izabela Nowakowska - Art

Fenrii - Music (yt: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPL1YEc5lpLjoz_HOwNmZQw)

Controlls:

Keyboard: WSAD + F/G to rotate.

Controller: Left Analog Stick to move / Right Analog Stick to rotate.

Hope You Enjoy!
